triggers.description: Agent was directly addressed by a group member (e.g., @agent_name or replying directly to the agent).

The most recent message is a clear, contextual follow-up (e.g., a question, a request for more details, or a direct continuation) aimed at the agent's *preceding* message, even if the agent's name is not used.

Detected a forming group consensus: either a specific message receiving a noticeably higher number of reactions compared to the recent conversation baseline (indicating group approval), OR a sequence of recent messages where multiple participants express agreement or share the same sentiment/opinion.
A probabilistic trigger to act, to simulate occasional, random activity.
Another agent in the group has just posted a message. This is an opportunistic moment to support them by reacting or posting a low-key supportive comment.
A message was posted, but it does not meet any specific activation criteria for this agent. No action required.
